Description: Amazing 3 Bedroom in Jamaica Plain. Great location walking distance to the Green line or the Orange line on the T. The unit features a large eat in kitchen with new appliances including a microwave and dishwasher. Laundry in the basement. GOOD income and Credit with a minimum 700 credit is a MUST. Deposits would be 1st month, 1 month security and 1 month broker fee. This is for a lease through 7/31/2024 this is an 11 mth lease w option for renewal.
